players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the first one to be eliminated. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks. We need to work together as a team to ensure the safety of all villagers."
You: "Let's talk about Alice. She was killed by the mafia, so we should focus on finding out who is a mafia member."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions and accuse each other just yet. We need solid evidence before making any accusations. Let's focus on gathering information and working together as a team."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
